title: Constant Champion Teleport Glitch
body: Please someone tell me a fix. I don't want to redownload the whole thing as we all know Australian internet

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try running through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article for me, also just to rule out any corrupt assets being the cause of your problem could you please try [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6).
